name: Global Innovation Platform
description: Factor is an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) and a decentralized operating system powered by a coin mining algorithm creating a blockchain. What makes this operating system different is its ability to run all kinds of Decentralized application initially developed for other decentralized OS. (Ethereum , Neo , EOS) Therefore Factor blockchain is the decentralized operating system that can run the most DApps. Factor archives this with its innovative Factor Hash Function, running many hash algorithm and provides the user with high-speed, scalability, connectivity, and security. Factor will play an important role in Fourth Industrial Revolution.
